title: 为什么装了Opti以后进入游戏不久就崩溃？
author: xyx0826
txt_content:
问题如下：
刚装了Optifine HD_U_B4版本，然后进MCBBS服务器不久就崩了，甚至刚上线就崩掉了。但是之前用MCPatcher装过高清材质&字体修复、随机生物贴图支持，是不是那个贴图支持出了问题？

- World MpServer Entities: 2 total; [atg['xyx0826'/3959143, l='MpServer', x=-745.00, y=74.62, z=-852.00], aur['BGpppp'/3948700, l='MpServer', x=-745.00, y=73.00, z=-852.00]]
- World MpServer Players: 2 total; [atg['xyx0826'/3959143, l='MpServer', x=-745.00, y=74.62, z=-852.00], aur['BGpppp'/3948700, l='MpServer', x=-745.00, y=73.00, z=-852.00]]
- World MpServer Chunk Stats: MultiplayerChunkCache: 55
